question: Who participates in the sprint planning?
What should teams do before Agile sprint planning and execution?
wrong_answers: Show the product to the client

question: What must the team discuss in a sprint planning meeting?
wrong_answers: Who will be the Scrum Master
Whether this or an alternative project would deliver more business value
What the team will be doing during weekend
answer: When and how they will deliver backlog items

question: How should user stories be written?
How much time a daily meeting usually takes?
Which of the following is a Scrum role?
What topic falls outside the scope of a well-run daily stand-up meeting?
wrong_answers: What everyone will work on today
answer: Planning out an iteration or sprint
